body_html:
Let me add a citation to the proposal: https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/index.html#main-building-script-debian-rules

For packages in the main archive, no required targets may attempt network access.

Note, the required targets include the whole package building process and more.
body_text:
Let me add a citation to the proposal: https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/index.html#main-building-script-debian-rules
For packages in the main archive, no required targets may attempt network access.

Note, the required targets include the whole package building process and more.
body:
Let me add a citation to the proposal: https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/index.html#main-building-script-debian-rules

```
For packages in the main archive, no required targets may attempt network access.
```

Note, the `required targets` include the whole package building process and more.
